text: [Ej pajomʙar] Bigū: "Ej ahli kitoʙ, ʙa sūji suxane ʙijoed, ki mijoni mo va şumo odilona ast [va inhirofe az haq dar on nest]: ki çuz Allohro naparastem va cizero [dar qudratu tadʙir] ʙo Ū şarik nasozem va ʙarxe az mo ʙarxi digarro ʙa çoj Alloh taolo [ʙa parastiş] nagirand". Agar onon [az in da'vat] rūj gardonand, pas, [ej mu'minon, ʙa eşon] ʙigūed: "Guvoh ʙoşed, ki mo taslim [-i avomiri ilohī] hastem
